meanings.definition: Money that is given back to someone who has returned a product or paid too much for something.
meanings.sent1: The store provided refunds to customers who returned the damaged items.
meanings.sent2: I received a refund for the overpriced shirt I bought last week.
meanings.sent3: The refunds for the broken toys made the children smile.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a warm refund on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The refunds sparkled in the sunlight, a sign of customer satisfaction.

meanings.definition: To give money back to someone who has returned a product or paid too much for something.
meanings.sent1: The company refunds customers promptly for any faulty products.
meanings.sent2: She refunded the extra amount I accidentally paid for the service.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly refunded the money to his friend for the borrowed pencil.
meanings.sent4: The rain refunded the parched land with life-giving water.
meanings.sent5: The teacher refunds praise to students for their hard work.
